issues.description: This contract executes a message call to to another contract. Make sure that the called contract is trusted and does not execute user-supplied code.
issues.title: Message call to external contract

issues.description:
Multiple sends exist in one transaction, try to isolate each external call into its own transaction. As external calls can fail accidentally or deliberately.
Consecutive calls: 
Call at address: 2429
Call at address: 2429
issues.title: Multiple Calls

issues.description:
In the function `safeWithdrawal()` the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.timestamp
issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function safeWithdrawal(). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
